Class AddList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • gui.AddList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class AddList
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class that creates a frame to show listings and statistics, an instance of this class is created on the class AppConfig.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddList()
      Constructor of this class it calls its superclass constructor to set the title, it also calls all the necessary methods in this class in order to initialize the panels when an object of this class is created.

      Returns the index of the country with the same name as the parameter variable.

      Returns true if the container of countries is empty.

      Sets the selected index of the TabbedPane/, this method is for exterior use and it is used in the class AppConfig.
      private ListaLigada<Modalidade> sportsFiltrados()
      Returns a linked list with filtered sports, only sports with results will be added to the list.

        h - the desired height to the window
        opcao - parameter to use when calling javax.swing.JFrame#setDefaultCloseOperation(int)
        visible - sets the windows to visible if the parameter is true

      • addCA

        private void addCA()
        Creates the form to Comparative Analysis that will be inserted into the panel ca. This form allows the user to choose from 2 to 5 countries he wants to compare, the first 4 indexes of the card panel are used to comboboxes showing a list of countries, the last 4 indexes are used to create tables with statistcs, those will be shown as a result of the selected countries. This action will be handled in the actionlistener of the button getResults which has several conditions in order not to let the user choose repeated countries. It uses the method isEmpty() to check if the list of countries isnt empty and avoid errors. It also uses the method createTable().
        See Also:
        container

      • addHistoricoPaises

        private void addHistoricoPaises()
        Creates the form to Nation's Ranking that will be inserted into the panel nr. This form allows the user to choose 2 editions of the games, as a result a table will be created using the method createTablePaisAtleta() and its content will be the historical of the nations between those 2 editions. The 1st index of the card panel has the form and the second index has the table created as a result of the options chosen on the form. It uses a static method of the class Listagem to receive the necessary data to create the table.
        See Also:
        container, Listagem.listarMedalhasPais(listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Pais>, listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Prova>, int, int, java.lang.String, jogosolimpicos.Disciplina)

      • addHistoricoAtletas

        private void addHistoricoAtletas()
        Creates the form to Athlete's Ranking that will be inserted into the panel ar. This form allows the user to choose 2 editions of the games, as a result a table will be created using the method createTablePaisAtleta() and its content will be the historical of the athletes between those 2 editions. The 1st index of the card panel has the form and the second index has the table created as a result of the options chosen on the form. It uses a static method of the class Listagem to receive the necessary data to create the table.
        See Also:
        container, Listagem.listarMedalhasAtleta(listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Atleta>, listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Equipa>, listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Prova>, int, int, java.lang.String, jogosolimpicos.Disciplina)

      • addHistoricoDiscipline

        private void addHistoricoDiscipline()
        Creates the form to Competition's Ranking that will be inserted into the panel ar. This form allows the user to choose 2 editions of the games and a competition, as a result a table will be created using the method createTablePaisAtleta() and its content will be the historical of the competition between those 2 editions. The 1st index of the card panel has the form and the second index has the table created as a result of the options chosen on the form. It uses a static method of the class Listagem to receive the necessary data to create the table.
        See Also:
        container, Listagem.listarMedalhasAtleta(listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Atleta>, listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Equipa>, listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Prova>, int, int, java.lang.String, jogosolimpicos.Disciplina)

      • addHistoricoSport

        private void addHistoricoSport()
        Creates the form to Sports Ranking that will be inserted into the panel me. This form allows the user to choose 2 editions of the games and a sport, as a result a table will be created using the method createTablePaisAtleta() and its content will be the historical of the sport between those 2 editions. The 1st index of the card panel has the form and the second index has the table created as a result of the options chosen on the form. It uses a static method of the class Listagem to receive the necessary data to create the table.
        See Also:
        container, Listagem.listarMedalhasAtleta(listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Atleta>, listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Equipa>, listaligada.ListaLigada<jogosolimpicos.Prova>, int, int, java.lang.String, jogosolimpicos.Disciplina)

        true if the container of countries is empty

      • findPais

        private int findPais(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the index of the country with the same name as the parameter variable.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the country
        Returns:
        i returns the index of the country with the same name as the parameter variable or -1 if it wasnt found

      • createTableDiscipline

        private javax.swing.JPanel createTableDiscipline(ListaLigada<Atleta> atleta,
                                       java.lang.String title)
        Returns a panel with a JTable created with the data parsed in parameters. The header is the only part that is defined inside the method yet, it is easy to modify.
        Parameters:
        atleta - a linked list with the name of athletes and the number of medals they have got
        title - the title
        Returns:
        pTabela Returns a panel with a table created with the data parsed in parameters

                                       java.lang.String tipo)
        Returns a panel with a JTable created with the data parsed in parameters. The header is the only part that is defined inside the method yet, it is easy to modify.
        Parameters:
        p - a linked list with the name of athletes and the number of medals they have got
        tipo - the title
        Returns:
        pTabela Returns a panel with a table created with the data parsed in parameters

      • createTable

        private javax.swing.JPanel createTable(int[] i)
        Returns a panel with a JTable created with the data parsed in parameters. The header is the only part that is defined inside the method yet, it is easy to modify.
        Parameters:
        i - vector with indexes of countries
        Returns:
        pTabela Returns a panel with a table created with the data parsed in parameters
